discussion_comments.comment_body:
You can use ```git cherry-pick 1021a9158690923a020d8de4956a646db1cb2e9a``` to process this PR. 

Generally speaking, it is better not to commit on the master branch. 

The master branch is used to synchronize with the upstream repository. 

Separately, git checkout -b a new branch
这个风险有点高，是否有更好的办法。

发布时遇到了 CI 通过但是本地请求一直返回 pending 的问题。
是否可以只检查产物 CI？
如果跳过的话，就跑一次本地 ci 兜底如何？
